summary: Held in the rugged Green Swamp of Dade City, Florida, the Skunk Apes Revenge 60K is a gritty endurance challenge that plunges runners into the heart of untamed wetlands. Participants traverse a grueling variety of terrain including sugar sand, fire berms, and single-track segments of the Florida Trail, all while listening for the calls of coyotes and the legendary cryptid that gives the race its name.
uniqueFeatures: Diverse Florida Ecosystems: The course is a comprehensive 'Florida terrain gauntlet,' featuring everything from muddy pasture lanes and dense swamp trails to challenging sugar sand and steep fire berms.

Cryptid-Themed Atmosphere: The race leans into Florida folklore, offering a wilderness experience where the sounds of hooting owls and buzzing insects create an immersive, slightly eerie environment inspired by the Skunk Ape legend.

Distinctive Rewards and Support: Beyond standard medals, finishers receive custom hats and collectible patches, while the event serves a dual purpose as a community pet food drive for the local charity 'Cindy’s Pets.'

media.title: Talking About Ourselves and the Skunk Ape's Revenge 60k
media.summary: A deep-dive podcast episode featuring an overview of the Skunk Ape's Revenge 60K race experience, its history, and the unique Florida trail culture.
media.contentSummary: This podcast episode features a personal race recap and discussion regarding the participants' experiences at the Skunk Ape's Revenge 60k trail race.

media.title: Joe Fuller Talks All Things Skunk Ape
media.summary: Race director Joe Fuller discusses the origins and technical challenges of the Skunk Ape race series, including specific course insights for the 60K and 100M events.
media.contentSummary: Joe Fuller shares his running history and provides a preview of the upcoming Skunk Ape 100 and 50-mile races, including the introduction of the challenging Berm 2.0 course feature.

media.title: A Deep Dive into the Skunk Ape’s Revenge 60k
media.summary: The inaugural episode of this trail-focused podcast features an in-depth review of the Skunk Ape's Revenge 60k, highlighting the unique ecosystem of the Green Swamp West Tract.
media.contentSummary: Hosts Shae, Joe, and Kevin discuss their personal running histories and provide a detailed race report for the Skunk Ape's Revenge 60k held in February 2024.
